languages.text: Соломон не чувствует, что достоин служить Лекс Империалис. Потребуется время, чтобы проктор вернул себе прежнюю непреклонную решимость.
Solomorne no longer feels worthy of serving the Lex Imperialis. It will take some time before the Proctor regains his unyielding resolve.
languages.original_text: Соломон не чувствует, что достоин служить Лекс Империалис. Потребуется время, чтобы проктор вернул себе прежнюю непреклонную решимость.

traits.locale_text: Solomorne does not feel worthy of serving Lex Imperialis. It will take time for the Proctor to regain his unyielding resolve.
Solomorne does not feel worthy of serving Lex Imperialis. It will take time for the Proctor to regain his unyielding resolve.
Solomorne no longer feels worthy of serving the Lex Imperialis. It will take some time before the Proctor regains his unyielding resolve.
Solomorne no longer feels worthy of serving the Lex Imperialis. It will take some time before the Proctor regains his unyielding resolve.
Solomorne no longer feels worthy of serving the Lex Imperialis. It will take some time before the Proctor regains his unyielding resolve.
Solomorne no longer feels worthy of serving the Lex Imperialis. It will take some time before the Proctor regains his unyielding resolve.

languages.text: Solomorne fühlt sich nicht mehr würdig, dem Lex Imperia zu dienen. Es wird einige Zeit dauern, bis der Proktor seine unerschütterliche Entschlossenheit wiedererlangt.
languages.original_text: Solomorne no longer feels worthy of serving the Lex Imperialis. It will take some time before the Proctor regains his unyielding resolve.

traits.locale_text: Solomorne fühlt sich nicht mehr würdig, dem Lex Imperia zu dienen. Es wird einige Zeit dauern, bis der Proktor seine unerschütterliche Entschlossenheit wiedererlangt.

languages.text: Solomorne ne se sent plus digne de servir la Lex Imperialis. Il lui faudra du temps pour retrouver sa détermination inébranlable.
languages.original_text: Solomorne no longer feels worthy of serving the Lex Imperialis. It will take some time before the Proctor regains his unyielding resolve.

traits.locale_text: Solomorne ne se sent plus digne de servir la Lex Imperialis. Il lui faudra du temps pour retrouver sa détermination inébranlable.

languages.text: 索罗蒙认为自己不再有资格为帝国法典效力。他恐怕需要恢复一段时间，才能再次变得坚定不移。
languages.original_text: Solomorne no longer feels worthy of serving the Lex Imperialis. It will take some time before the Proctor regains his unyielding resolve.

traits.locale_text: 索罗蒙认为自己不再有资格为帝国法典效力。他恐怕需要恢复一段时间，才能再次变得坚定不移。

languages.text: Solomorne ya no se siente digno de servir a la Lex Imperialis. El Procurador tardará un tiempo en recuperar su resolución inquebrantable.
languages.original_text: Solomorne no longer feels worthy of serving the Lex Imperialis. It will take some time before the Proctor regains his unyielding resolve.

traits.locale_text: Solomorne ya no se siente digno de servir a la Lex Imperialis. El Procurador tardará un tiempo en recuperar su resolución inquebrantable.

languages.text: ソロモーンはもはや自分にレックス・インペリアに仕える資格があるとは感じていない。代理人がかつての揺るぎない決意を取り戻すには、しばらく時間がかかるだろう。
languages.original_text: Solomorne no longer feels worthy of serving the Lex Imperialis. It will take some time before the Proctor regains his unyielding resolve.

traits.locale_text: ソロモーンはもはや自分にレックス・インペリアに仕える資格があるとは感じていない。代理人がかつての揺るぎない決意を取り戻すには、しばらく時間がかかるだろう。

languages.text: Solomorne artık kendini Lex İmperialis'e hizmete layık görmüyor. Üsteğmen'in boyun eğmek bilmez kararlılığını yeniden kazanması biraz zaman alacak.
languages.original_text: Solomorne no longer feels worthy of serving the Lex Imperialis. It will take some time before the Proctor regains his unyielding resolve.

traits.locale_text: Solomorne artık kendini Lex İmperialis'e hizmete layık görmüyor. Üsteğmen'in boyun eğmek bilmez kararlılığını yeniden kazanması biraz zaman alacak.
